question: What will be the Federal Reserve interest rate after the [MONTH] [YEAR] FOMC meeting?
description: Predict the target federal funds rate in basis points. Current rate: [CURRENT_RATE_BPS] bps ([CURRENT_RATE_PERCENT]%)
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the upper bound of the federal funds target rate announced by the Federal Reserve after the FOMC meeting on [DATE].

Example: If the Fed announces a 4.50% - 4.75% range, the market resolves to 475 (basis points).

The value is already in basis points (1 bps = 0.01%), so no decimal scaling is needed.
Only the official Federal Reserve announcement will be used.
If the Fed maintains a rate range, the UPPER bound will be used for resolution.
Market range: [MIN_VALUE] bps - [MAX_VALUE] bps ([MIN_VALUE_PERCENT]% - [MAX_VALUE_PERCENT]%)
_comment_image: Optional: Upload image first using POST /api/markets/upload-image, then add the URL and key here
